info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 06 at 12:31PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Light to moderate snow and bitterly cold temperatures continue over Central and North-central Montana this afternoon... Bands of snow will continue to impact Central and North-central Montana through late this evening. As of 12 pm, the heaviest snow was located along and just just northeast of a Valier to Hobson line. Snowfall rates may exceed a half inch per hour at times, causing visibility reductions below a half mile and slippery roads. Anyone traveling should be prepared for difficult winter driving conditions and bitterly cold temperatures. Also, be sure your vehicle is in good mechanical condition before traveling.
